name: Geometry Galaxy 360° - Rhythmic Galactic Star Explorer Shooter (LITE)
name_original: Geometry Galaxy 360° - Rhythmic Galactic Star Explorer Shooter (LITE)
description:
A little spaceship in the rhythmic infinity of space battles its way through an enormous number of diverse, colorful, and strange spaceships. How long can you stay alive?

Oh, and in space H-Bombs are a thing in Geometry Galaxy 360°...
